lore: The Diabolic Watchman is the Horde's greatest expert in melee combat. It can skillfully wield any weapon and it helps train its comrades-in-arms to improve their physical abilities. It follows a strict training regimen from a young age that only a few of its kind are able to endure. Few of its enemies forget the powerful blows of its mace... if they live to tell about it.
menagerieDialog: I'm tired of running around, everything hurts! Can't we rest for a little while?
What are we doing here? Let's get moving!
My hounds crave the flesh of humans. What do you say we go out and start a war to sate their appetites?
(It's busy feeding rotten meat to its pups.)
(It's having a difficult time controlling its beasts. What has them so anxious?)
name: Diabolic Watchman
